text: Renato Cattaneo (; 6 October 1903 - 1974) was an Italian professional football player and manager who played as a forward. ==Club career== Cattaneo played for 8 seasons (225 games, 73 goals) in the Serie A for U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912 and A.S. Roma. ==International career== Cattaneo made his Italy national football team debut on 25 January 1931 in a game against France and scored on his debut in a 5–0 win. He did not appear for the national team again until 1935, when he made his second and last international appearance. ==Honours== ===Individual=== * 4th best goalscorer in Serie A: 1934–35 Serie A (16 goals). ==External links== * Category:1903 births Category:1974 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Italy international footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:Serie C players Category:U.S. Alessandria Calcio 1912 players Category:A.S. title: Renato Cattaneo (footballer, born 1903)
